base_description: Round sunglasses with teal lenses and black rims.
part_description: Two round teal lenses, black rims with white dots, silver bridge and temples, and teal nose pads.
internal_interaction_description: The lenses are held within the black rims, which are connected by a silver bridge. The rims feature white decorative dots. The silver temples extend from the rims, providing support when worn. Teal nose pads are attached to the bridge, ensuring comfort and stability on the nose.
external_interaction_description: These sunglasses shield the eyes from sunlight and UV rays, enhancing visual comfort outdoors. The temples rest on the ears, while the nose pads sit on the nose, allowing the user to wear them securely. They can be paired with various fashion styles for aesthetic purposes.
